unnormalised: Arrey bhai, India ani Pakistan-acho cricket match 15/08/2024-ak dupari 2:30 vazta IST, baraabar na? Sogle tujje yojnaa adim korunk visronaka!
normalised: Arrey bhai, India ani Pakistan-acho cricket match pandhra August don hajar chovis don tis mintam dupari I-S-T-k asa, barabor? Soglle tujje plans poilim korunk visronaka!
text: Arrey bhai, India ani Pakistan-acho cricket match 15/08/2024-ak dupari 2:30 vazta IST, baraabar na? Sogle tujje yojnaa adim korunk visronaka!
